Work About
Edgy Egon While the concept of Edgy Egon may be regarded as highly versatile, its bare essence is that of showcasing exclusive and sustainable designs made by aspiring talents, as well as the exchange of knowledge within the area. Offering the client individualized and long-lasting furniture, the focus lies strictly on providing functionality and artistry without losing sight of high-brow aesthetics. A close contact to the respective designer and each piece’s background creates the core the company’s values. Edgy Egon will always primarily be a “living room” of exchange for creatives and the curious, offering workshops and seminars in order to create a strong, social platform of knowledge. Client: Diploma project Services: Concept, branding, web design and marketing Year: 2019
